title: Lions Ticket Giveaway!
description:
Jalen and Jacoby have A LOT to say about Jokic and Denver's dismantling of the Lakers, they have A LOT to say about the Nets, Ben Simmons, and how Giannis put them to sleep, and of course... the Toronto Raptors who are putting teams in the sharpshooter every single night. But... the heart of today's show is Jalen Rose giving away Lions tickets and a live J&J experience to fans! Pull up, you might just win something! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
